name: Anywhere But Here (Hunter_of_Dune, BryanTai)
description:
It's a Bullet Hell but all you got are portals. Dodge enemy ships and bullets until your Escape Warp Drive fully charges. Warp yourself away from danger or enemy ships away from you. Don't get tripped up on your own portals. Wherever you go, make sure it's Anywhere But Here

Controls:

WASD: Movement
Mouse: Aim
Left Mouse Click: Warp to Cursor
Middle Mouse Click: Panic Jump Warp (has cooldown)
Right Mouse Click: Warp Enemy ship away

Created in 7 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2
Theme: LET THERE BE CHAOS

Credits:
Bryan Tai https://bryantai.itch.io/
Daryl Miller https://hunter-of-dune.itch.io/
Deidre Hebig https://twitter.com/SciFiGirlGamez

Music:
